author: Dr. Nancy A. Anoruo
title: The coronavirus dilemma: Are we using ventilators too much?
description: As hospitals seek innovative solutions to treat the surge of COVID-19 patients, expanding ventilator supply has been central to the conversation.
content:
As hospitals seek innovative solutions to treat the surge of COVID-19 patients with resources running thin, expanding ventilator supply has been central to the conversation.
Research has shown that only a third of patients placed on a ventilator survive the … [+6522 chars]
